lead_paragraph: A history of events surrounding the long-simmering investigation that forced the closing of The News of the World and the collapse of a $12 billion bid to assume full control of Britain’s biggest satellite broadcaster.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A history of events surrounding the long-simmering investigation that forced the closing of The News of the World and the collapse of a $12 billion bid to assume full control of Britain’s biggest satellite broadcaster.

headline.main: Anatomy of the News International Scandal
